name: Hyperspace Narwhale
description:
In the intergalactic waterways of deep space, the alien species known as the narwhale rockets through space at unearthly speeds and is capable of firing laser beams from its horn that could easily devastate any organic life form it touches. Fortunately, the narwhale serves as a vessel for intergalactic public transit.

As the narwhale, pick up passengers and stay clear of the dangerous man o’ space as you traverse the universe’s many groovy waterways.

For the best experience, I recommend downloading the Windows version.
